amendment.description: Page 38, insert after line 10 the following: SEC. 110. PROMPT ISSUANCE OF OIRA GUIDELINES.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 115-2 to establish a timeline by which the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs must issue guidelines under title I of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Chaffetz.
